briefTitle: A Trial of Corticosteroids for Low Back Pain
officialTitle: Utility of Intramuscular Corticosteroids for Radicular Low Back Pain
summary: Low back pain is a common symptom that functionally disables many people. When the low back pain is accompanied by pain that shoots down the leg, it is felt to be caused by a herniated disc. We are conducting this study to determine if a powerful anti-inflammatory agent will decrease the pain and functional impairment that is associated with this illness.

primaryOutcome.measure: Numerical Rating Scale (0-10), an Interval Pain Scale, on Which 0 Indicates no Pain and 10 Indicates the Worst Pain Imaginable
